channel.title: Mockito on Middleware Warez
channel.description: Recent content in Mockito on Middleware Warez

item.title: Mocking builders with Mockito answers
item.description: I’ve been looking for some ways to use Mockito to with builder pattern using fluent calls. There are couple of articles online, however none of these addressed my case, a builder which receives calls and returns fully working object after a final ‘‘build’’ call without the need for further setup.
